title: Converse CONS Space 002 BLN : Art
description:
For a two week period in October, Converse took over three floors of an abandoned textile factory to create the second CONS Space with skaters, sculptors and live-in artists.

On the first floor and in the outer environment of the building became a live-in canvas for around 20 artists working alone and collaboratively to create skatable sculptures, tape art, light writing, murals, graffiti and loads more.

Track: "A This Is A Beta" by Kosmonaut
